name: Progress Chess
description:
Progress Chess offers chess fans great opportunities to immerse themselves in the world of chess and discover new facets of this exciting game. This game will be an excellent trainer for a beginner learning chess: by playing in tournaments and solving problems, you can gradually increase your level, going from a beginner to grandmaster.

Here you can compete with 64 virtual human chess players of different levels and playing styles: from a beginner who has just studied chess to an international grandmaster with an ELO rating of over 2600. You can play training games, random games for rating, or you can take part in full-fledged tournaments , taking place in the round-robin, Swiss, or Olympic systems and win virtual awards. Games take place in full-fledged virtual environments, such as a restaurant, game room, school, or chess club.

As your skill grows, you will be assigned ranks and ELO ratings. If you are just starting to learn chess, several training modes are available to you: a basic course for beginners, where you will master the rules of the game and the basics of chess theory, as well as an advanced course in solving combination problems and etudes.

We bring to your attention a new mode of progressive chess: having 15 pawns and a king at the beginning of the game, turn the pawns into pieces one by one according to your own plan and create your own combination of pieces to win!

Key features:

  • 70 virtual chess players from beginner to grandmaster, each with their own character and playing style.
  • Extensive training mode options: setting a given position and arbitrary time control: blitz, rapid chess, classics, etc.
  • Play in chess tournaments and cups, move from a beginner's club to an amateur and then a professional league.
  • Win virtual prizes and place them in your room.
  • Take training courses at a chess school and receive virtual diplomas.
  • During the training you will be offered about 100 problems and studies!.
  • More than 40 unique realistic 3D locations in which games take place.
  • Over 20 awesome sets of 3D boards and pieces.
  • Three in one: you can develop your chess career in any of three possible modes: classical chess, Fischer chess and progressive chess!.
